00055                   {
00056                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00092             function                process_rutube( $Str , $Changed )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'rutube' ) ; )
00097                         {
00098                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'rutube.tpl' );
00099                               
00100                               $Template = str_replace( '{code}' , $Parameters , $Template );
00101                               
00102                               $Str = str_replace( "{rutube:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00103                               
00104                               $Changed = true;
00105                         }
00106                         
00107                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00108                   }
00109                   catch( Exception $e )
00110                   {
00111                         $Args = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $Args , $e );
00112                   }
00113             }
00114             
00141             function                process_youtube( $Str , $Changed )
00142             {
00143                   try
00144                   {
00145                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'youtube' ) ; )
00146                         {
00147                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'youtube.tpl' );
00148                               
00149                               $Template = str_replace( '{code}' , $Parameters , $Template );
00150                               
00151                               $Str = str_replace( "{youtube:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00152                               
00153                               $Changed = true;
00154                         }
00155                         
00156                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00157                   }
00158                   catch( Exception $e )
00159                   {
00160                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00161                   }
00162             }

00194             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00195             {
00196                   try
00197                   {
00198                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_rutube( $Str , $Changed );
00199                         
00200                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_youtube( $Str , $Changed );
00201                         
00202                         return( $Str );
00203                   }
00204                   catch( Exception $e )
